cards.title: Intro
cards.body: A visual cheat-sheet for the 62 keyboard shortcuts found in the Apple Music app. This application is MacOS-only.

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Start playing or pause the selected song

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Play the currently selected song from the beginning

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Move forward within a song

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Move backward within a song

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Stop playing the selected song

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: When a song is playing, play the next song in a list

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: When a song is playing, play the previous song in a list

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Show the currently playing song in the list

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Show the Playing Next queue

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Listen to the next album in a list

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Listen to the previous album in a list

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Increase the volume

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Decrease the volume

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Open the equalizer

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Go to the next chapter, if available

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Go to the previous chapter, if available

cards.title: Playing Music
cards.back: Stream audio file at a specific URL to Music

cards.title: Playlists
cards.back: Create a new playlist

cards.back: Create a playlist from a selection of songs

cards.title: Playlists
cards.back: Create a new Smart Playlist

cards.title: Playlists
cards.back: Start the Genius Shuffle

cards.title: Playlists
cards.back: Refresh a Genius Playlist, when the playlist is selected

cards.title: Playlists
cards.back: Delete the selected playlist without confirmation

cards.title: Playlists
cards.back: Delete the selected playlist and all songs it contains from your library

cards.title: Playlists
cards.back: Delete the selected song from your library and all playlists

cards.back: Open the MiniPlayer

cards.back: Open the Full Screen Player

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Toggle full-screen view

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Show or hide the status bar

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Open the info window for the selected song

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: In the info window, see information for the next song

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: In the info window, see information for the previous song

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Go to the previous pane in the info window

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Go to the next pane in the info window

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Open the View Options window for the selected source

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Turn the visualizer on or off

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: See more options when a visual effect is showing

cards.back: Refresh Apple Music or the iTunes Store

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Open the Music window

cards.back: Close the Music window

cards.back: Put the Music window in the Dock

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Hide the Music window

cards.title: Window Options
cards.back: Hide all other applications

cards.back: Add a file to your library

cards.back: Show where a song file is located

cards.title: Library
cards.back: Select the search field

cards.back: Undo your last typing change while editing an item
